arterialSpinLabelingType._instruction: Add the type of this arterial spin labeling MR image.

labelingDistance._instruction: Add distance from the center of the imaging slab to the center of the labeling plane ((P)CASL) or the leading edge of the labeling slab (PASL).

labelingDuration._instruction: Add total duration of the labeling pulse train, corresponding to the temporal width of the labeling bolus for 'PCASL' or 'CASL'.

labelingLocationDescription._instruction: Enter any description of the location of the labeling plane ((P)CASL) or slab (PASL) that cannot be captured by other fields.

labelingLocationImage._instruction: Add an image showing the labeling location.

labelingOrientation._instruction: Add orientation of the labeling plane ((P)CASL) or slab (PASL).

m0Image._instruction: Add the M0image, if it is not stored inside the main NIfTI file.

output._instruction: Add all outputs generated by this acquisition including asl context file.

postLabelingDelay._instruction: Add the postlabeling delay (PLD) time, in seconds, after the end of the labeling (for 'CASL' or 'PCASL') or middle of the labeling pulse (for 'PASL') until the middle of the excitation pulse applied to the imaging slab (for 3D acquisition) or first slice.

totalAcquiredPairs._instruction: Add the total number of control-label pairs.
